arts.ttl: Mason Greenwood is pelted with missiles from the stands before Nice and Marseille players brawl on the pitch after ex-Man United man scores in feisty Riviera derby
arts.sum: Mason Greenwood was reportedly targeted with missiles after he scored against Nice in a feisty Riviera derby clash on Friday night.
